sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Remove "service_offering_sla" table</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
	if (!GlideTableDescriptor.isValid("service_offering_sla"))
		return;

	var sysWizardGr = new GlideRecord("sys_wizard");
	sysWizardGr.setUseEngines(false);
	if (sysWizardGr.get("bc8ade645f303000a9ad2572f2b4772e")) {
		sysWizardGr.setValue("intercepts", "");
		sysWizardGr.update();
	}

	var dictGr = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
	dictGr.addQuery("name", "service_offering_sla");
	dictGr.addQuery("internal_type", "collection");
	dictGr.query();
	if (dictGr.next()) {
		dictGr.setValue("active", false);
		dictGr.setUseEngines(false);
		dictGr.update();
	}

	var aclGr = new GlideRecord("sys_security_acl");
	aclGr.addActiveQuery();
	aclGr.addQuery("name", "STARTSWITH", "service_offering_sla");
	aclGr.addQuery("sys_id","NOT IN", "657dc42057732300491d8f90ac94f9bb,c84d842057732300491d8f90ac94f964");
	aclGr.setValue("active", false);
	aclGr.updateMultiple();

	var slaGr = new GlideRecord("service_offering_sla");
	slaGr.setWorkflow(false);
	slaGr.setUseEngines(false);
	slaGr.autoSysFields(false);
	slaGr.queryNoDomain();
	while (slaGr.next()) {
		slaGr.setValue("service_commitment", true);
		slaGr.setValue("sys_class_name", "contract_sla");
		slaGr.update();
	}

	GlideUpdateManager2().load("com.snc.service_portfolio.sla_commitment", "update.legacy_commitment_plugin");
})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-02-05 17:36:42</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>a5a37bff57132300491d8f90ac94f9ee</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Remove "service_offering_sla" table</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">ff583506471ef190020ba9f8536d43d0</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_a5a37bff57132300491d8f90ac94f9ee</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-02-22 12:48:24</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
